screens.label: Homepage with swap interface - Market tab selected, USDC/SOL trading pair
Terminal page - Discover tab with Cooking filter showing trending tokens with 24h data
Terminal AlphaScan tab - New token launches with filter and search options
Terminal Tracker tab - Manage Wallets empty state with Add Wallet option
Terminal Positions tab - Connect wallet prompt to view live positions and PnL
Terminal Watchlist tab - Shows SOL and JUP tokens with 24h price data and metrics
Perps page loading - SOL perpetual trading with price $81.72 and 24h stats
Lend page - Terms and Conditions modal for Jupiter Lend service
Lend Earn tab - Jupiter Lend money market with $1.73B supply and JupUSD vault showing 5.23% APY
Lend Borrow tab - Get a loan with crypto collateral, showing Top Vaults (loading state)
Lend Multiply tab - Amplify exposure with leveraged loops, showing JLP/USDC, INF/SOL, JupSOL/SOL options
Lend Transparency tab - Security audits section with GitHub link and audit tabs
Lend Statistics tab - Liquidity view showing USDC, JLP, and SOL pool stats with TVL and APY data
Predict page - Browse tab with category filters (Sports, Crypto, Politics, etc.) and loading event cards
Portfolio page - Landing page with Solana DeFi tracking description and demo preview
Rewards page - Two live campaigns: Active Staking Rewards (ASR) and TCG Rewards Season 2
Referral Dashboard - Shows referral link section, total referrals, and referral campaigns
More menu dropdown - Shows Positions/PnL, Onboard, Mobile, Extension Wallet, VRFD, and social links
Referral modal - How Referrals Work with tiered earning structure diagram (30%, 3%, 2%)
Swap page - Limit order tab with USDC to SOL, showing price and slippage settings
Swap page - Recurring order tab with DCA settings (120 USDC to SOL every 1 minute over 2 orders)
Token selector modal - Shows SOL, USDC, USDT, USD1, jlUSDC, cbBTC with search and filter tabs
404 error page - Page Not Found with Back to Home button
Connect wallet modal - Shows Jupiter Extension (recommended) and Jupiter Mobile options
Connect wallet modal expanded - Shows additional wallet options including Social Login, Phantom, Solflare, Backpack, Coinbase, Magic Eden, Trust, Ledger
Homepage scrolled - Trending tokens (TRUMP, HYPE, PUMP) and Jupiter Prediction Markets promo section
Homepage scrolled - Jupiter Perps (250x leverage) and Jupiter Lend Vaults (JupUSD 5.23%, USDC 4.38%, SOL 3.58% APY)
Homepage scrolled - Jupiter Multiply Loops (JupSOL-SOL, JLP-USDC) and Jupiter Terminal stocks section (NVDAx, TSLAx, CRCLx)
